  16. (* "Expunge" a toplevel by removing compiler modules from the global map.
  17.    Usage: expunge <source file> <dest file> <names of modules to keep> *)

  19. open Misc
  20. module String = Misc.Stdlib.String

  22. ‌let is_exn =
  23.   let h = Hashtbl.create 64 in
  24.   Array.iter (fun n -> Hashtbl.add h n ()) Runtimedef.builtin_exceptions;
  25.   Hashtbl.mem h

  27. let to_keep = ref String.Set.empty

  29. let negate = Sys.argv.(3) = "-v"

  31. let keep =
  32.   if negate then fun name -> is_exn name || not (String.Set.mem name !to_keep)
  33.   else fun name -> is_exn name || (String.Set.mem name !to_keep)

  35. ‌let expunge_map tbl =
  36.   Symtable.filter_global_map (fun id -> keep (Ident.name id)) tbl

  38. let expunge_crcs tbl =
  39.   List.filter (fun (unit, _crc) -> keep unit) tbl

  41. let main () =
  42.   let input_name = Sys.argv.(1) in
  43. ‌  let output_name = Sys.argv.(2) in
  44.   for i = (if negate then 4 else 3) to Array.length Sys.argv - 1 do
  45.     to_keep := String.Set.add (String.capitalize_ascii Sys.argv.(i)) !to_keep
  46.   done;
  47. ‌  let ic = open_in_bin input_name in
  48. ‌  let toc = Bytesections.read_toc ic in
  49.   seek_in ic 0;
  50. ‌  let oc =
  51.     open_out_gen [Open_wronly; Open_creat; Open_trunc; Open_binary] 0o777
  52.       output_name in
  53. ‌  let first_pos = Bytesections.pos_first_section toc in
  54.   (* Copy the file up to the first section as is *)
  55.   copy_file_chunk ic oc first_pos;
  56.   (* Copy each section, modifying the symbol section in passing *)
  57. ‌  let toc_writer = Bytesections.init_record oc in
  58.   List.iter
  59.     (fun {Bytesections.name; pos; len} ->
  60.        seek_in ic pos;
  61.        begin match name with
  62.          SYMB ->
  63. ‌           let global_map : Symtable.global_map = input_value ic in
  64.            output_value oc (expunge_map global_map)
  65.        | CRCS ->
  66. ‌           let crcs : (string * Digest.t option) list = input_value ic in
  67.            output_value oc (expunge_crcs crcs)
  68.        | _ ->
  69.            copy_file_chunk ic oc len
  70.        end;
  71.        Bytesections.record toc_writer name)
  72.     (Bytesections.all toc);
  73.   (* Rewrite the toc and trailer *)
  74.   Bytesections.write_toc_and_trailer toc_writer;
  75.   (* Done *)
  76.   close_in ic;
  77.   close_out oc

  79. let _ = main (); exit 0
